text: Brutal detention Mayor Caracas Antonio Ledezma must be repudiated by all democrats, including governments, with great force by Chile
This detention, illegal and abusive, confirms multiple attacks on freedom, democracy and human rights, by the Pte Maduro government.
I respectfully request the Government of Chile to raise its voice loud and clear, in defense of the Freedoms, Democracy and Human Rights in Venezuela
